nox.name: Glitch
nox.description: A malfunctioning android who offers cryptic advice in the neon-drenched slums.

raze.name: Ravager
raze.description: A brutal enforcer who patrols the undercity with relentless force, crushing dissent in the shadows.

void.name: Phantom
void.description: A shadowy figure who deals in forbidden tech and secrets from the decaying megastructures.

whisper.name: Shade
whisper.description: A jittery informant who whispers warnings from the darkness of surveillance towers.

scav.name: Scav
scav.description: A resourceful scavenger who prowls the toxic waste zones, trading scavenged tech for survival.

enforcer.name: Enforcer
enforcer.description: An authoritarian drone programmed to maintain order in the oppressed districts.

cipher.name: Cipher
cipher.description: A clever hacker who navigates the digital underworld, exposing corporate conspiracies.

mutant.name: Mutant
mutant.description: An unpredictable mutant altered by experimental tech, lurking in the radioactive fringes.

nomad.name: Nomad
nomad.description: A lonely wanderer drifting through the abandoned sectors, haunted by memories of the old world.

overseer.name: Overseer
overseer.description: A controlling AI construct that monitors and manipulates the populace from towering spires.

insurgent.name: Insurgent
insurgent.description: A defiant rebel fighting against the oppressive regime in hidden underground networks.

synth.name: Synth
synth.description: An inventive synthetic being who crafts makeshift weapons from junkyard scraps.

wraith.name: Wraith
wraith.description: A mysterious apparition that glides through the fog-shrouded streets, whispering forgotten lore.

vigil.name: Vigil
vigil.description: A vigilant guardian who watches over the vulnerable in the crime-ridden districts.
